resources.string:
Hello!!

"AUST GPA Calculator"-this application has been developed by Istiak Ahmed and Md. Siam Ansary for their semester project of CSE 2200:Software Development Lab III.

This application is only for the students of Ahsanullah University of Science and Technology.They can have their gpa calculated by entering their scores in courses.

This application is not flawless and does not have all the necessary features but we look forward to work on its betterment.

This application is for the students of Ahsanullah University of Science and Technology.
From the first activity , students have various options.
There is a simple calculator for the use of students. They can do addition , subtraction , multiplication and division using it.
The About page tells about its developers.
Students can select their desired departments. Architecture department has ten semesters while all the other departments have eight.Selecting their semester , they will be able to calculate their GPA.There are options for entering their ID , Session and marks in courses. Pressing the "GPA" button , thy will have the result. If they press "SAVE" button , information would be recorded . Students can check their records and delete them . They can delete single records entering the record number and also there is option for clearing all the records at the same time.
